system.description: Effect: Items and surfaces within the [Blast] area become wickedly cold. A creature that starts their Activation on a square with the Harzard takes a Tick of Ice-Type HP damage. Creature that moves through the applied squares takes a Tick of Ice-Type HP damage for every meter they travel. If a creature moves at least 3 meters through the Hazard, they gain Freeze 5. The presence of Snowy Weather reduces the number of meters required to cause Freeze by 1.
